about_the_game:
You are a replicant engineered by the Corporation for a single purpose: gather valuable bio-species from abandoned facilities across various planets.

Alone or with up to three teammates, you'll land on planet surfaces to explore and locate facility entrances. Inside, navigate dark, procedurally generated networks of rooms and tunnels to collect small creatures you can carry—but beware of monsters that aim to end you. Stealth, strategy, and teamwork are essential to evade or confront these threats.

With limited time on each planet, you must act swiftly to meet your KPIs.
Use in-game radio communication to share information and coordinate actions to access restricted areas.

Finally, uncover the unsettling truth behind your mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: First-person co-op survival horror for 1-4 players with stylized low-poly graphics. Navigate dark, procedural mazes to collect bio-species and evade deadly monsters. Use teamwork and radio communication to overcome obstacles and meet your quota before time runs out.
